title: First day of logging
logs: I just deployed the portfolio on vercel, I've had a few days of creating process that is documented. The sketching of the initial idea and the figma designing process are documented and will be added to the portfolio page. There's still a lot to be done, fighting!!

title: Socially connected now
logs: I added links to my socials and disabled the pages that are not reachable for now. I also did some research today on how I want to display the technologies I can use. In the end, I settled on using D3 to create a disjoint force-directed graph of the things I know; I sure hope this does not bite me back in the future.

title: I'm trying really hard
logs: So today, the essay review went really well and I think I'll be able to learn a lot from it. I'm not here for that; I tried to implement a D3 disjointed force-directed graph but I ran into problems with the d3 types for typescript. Unless I missed something — for which I'll ask people who should know more than me — I think I'll contribute to d3/types...

Update: I figured it out, my apologies to Tom Wanzek, Alex Ford, Boris Yankov, denisname, and Nathan Bierema; Though the documentation was scarce, I should've found and read the entire source code earlier instead of blaming the code...
